key_work.title: VCS1 and VCS3 Synthesiser, from Don Banks music studio
key_work.brief_description: The soundtrack to Doctor Who’s battles with the Daleks was made by the VCS3. This portable synthesiser was created in 1969 and was originally commissioned by Australian composer Don Banks who wanted an instrument that would let him work at home.

constellations_other.name: Breaking the binary
constellations_other.description: Tilda Swinton name has become synonymous with androgyny since she first appeared on our screens in the mid-1980s, leading a cultural shift towards today’s understanding of gender as fluid and ever-changing. Orlando was key to establishing her influence and allure.

end.title: Clock Tower
end.brief_description: Clock Tower is a survival horror point-and-click adventure game developed and published by Human Entertainment for the Super Famicom in 1995. The story follows orphan Jennifer Simpson soon after she is adopted by the Barrows family along with other orphaned girls.

links.description: Clock Tower creator Kono stated that he wanted to create a playable version of Dario Argento’s films, specifically Suspiria and Phenomena. And boy did it pay off!
